translations: n．谋杀（复数）：故意非法杀死他人的行为。
· The city has seen a rise in murders this year.
今年这个城市的谋杀案件有所上升。
v．谋杀（第三人称单数现在时）：故意非法杀死他人。
· He murders anyone who gets in his way.
任何妨碍他的人，他都会杀掉。

phrs.translation: 大屠杀；大规模的谋杀；集体屠杀
可怕的谋杀；恐怖的喊声

sentences.sentence: He had confessed to seventeen murders.
The local community was shocked by the murders.
sentences.translation: 当地社会对这些谋杀案感到震惊。

sentences.sentence: He was insane when he carried out the grisly murders.
sentences.translation: 他在进行那些恐怖的谋杀时已精神错乱。
